Found a solution to above problem on a forum.
Heres the copy/paste : 

""Problem: When loading the game it halts on a blank screen with a Protection Error

Solution: This is caused by the latest version of Nero and some of the codecs this installs on your system.

You should be able to workaround this problem by modifying your CMR 2005 shortcut as follows:

1) Edit your Colin McRae Rally 2005 Windows shortcut (found on the desktop and/or the start menu) by right clicking on it and selecting properties.
2) In the target box, add NOVIDEO after the target entry, so the target looks like this

"C:\Program Files\Codemasters\Colin McRae Rally 2005\CMR5.exe" NOVIDEO

3) Click on OK or Apply and now try running the game again""
